study.investigators: Heyerdahl, E.K.; Lertzman, K.P.; Karpuk, S.
study.studyNotes: CORRECTION TO DATA: On June 1, 2021, a correction was made to data file calst001.fhx.  REASONING: Sample S1A-L4 (column 86) contained a second start indicator as its year 1822 and 1902 both contained a '{' (inner-ring}. CORRECTION: the 1902 '{', was changed to '|' (recorder year).
